title: Domanda Championship chests
body:
Su ff@20 il testo dice così: "Any Hextech Chests purchased during Worlds (Championship Chests during Worlds season) will contain all the shards and materials you’re used to but will also come with bonus Championship Jewels if you’re looking to get to tier 3 faster. Bundles of ten chests will get you enough Jewels for tier 3 and a free Championship Ward as well. Players who aren’t looking to spend RP will be able to get the 2016 Worlds icon and upgrade it to tier 2 with the same jewels, though the Worlds icon won’t have an emote or recall".

Non mi è chiaro però se queste shard si ottengono comprando le chest mentre i worlds sono in corso, oppure possono essere ottenute già ora.

replies.body: Possono essere ottenute già ora, e se ho capito bene le puoi comprare anche con gli ip
